00016 bool LogicCalc::Calculate(){
00017         bool hasil;
00018         if(mode == 1){
00019                 hasil = CalculatePrefix();
00020         }
00021         else if (mode == 2){
00022                 hasil = CalculateInfix();
00023         }
00024         else if(mode == 3){
00025                 hasil = CalculatePostfix();
00026         }
00027         return hasil;
00028 }

00030 bool LogicCalc::CalculatePrefix(){
00031     char buffer[15];
00032     string jawab;
00033     int i,j; //iterator
00034     bool op1, op2, x; //operand dan hasil
00035     int len; //panjang
00036     len = this->ekspresi.length();
00037     j = 0;
00038     for(i=len-1; i>=0; i--){
00039         if(ekspresi[i] == '0' || ekspresi[i]=='1'){
00040             buffer[0] = ekspresi[i];
00041             x = atoi(buffer);
00042             operand << x;
00043         }
00044         else if(ekspresi[i] == '&' || ekspresi[i] == '|' || ekspresi[i]=='~'){
00045                         operatorx << ekspresi.substr(i,1);
00046             operand << Evaluate();
00047         }
00048     }
00049     x = operand.getLastData();
00050     if(operand.getLastData() == 0){
00051         jawab = "false";
00052     }
00053     else{
00054         jawab = "true";
00055     }
00056     cout << "Answer is " << jawab << endl;
00057     return x;
00058 }

00064 bool LogicCalc::CalculatePostfix(){
00065         char buffer[15];
00066     string jawab;
00067     int i,j; //iterator
00068         bool op1, op2, x; //operand dan hasil
00069         int len; //panjang
00070     len = this->ekspresi.length();
00071     j = 0;
00072     for(i=0; i<len;i++){
00073         if(ekspresi[i] == '0' || ekspresi[i]=='1'){
00074             buffer[0] = ekspresi[i];
00075                         x = atoi(buffer);
00076             operand << x;
00077         }
00078         else if(ekspresi[i] == '&' || ekspresi[i] == '|' || ekspresi[i]=='~'){
00079             operatorx << ekspresi.substr(i,1);
00080             operand << Evaluate();
00081         }
00082     }
00083     x = operand.getLastData();
00084         if(operand.getLastData() == 0){
00085                 jawab = "false";
00086         }
00087         else{
00088                 jawab = "true";
00089         }
00090     cout << "Answer is " << jawab << endl;

00094 bool LogicCalc::Evaluate(){
00095         bool ans, op1, op2;
00096         string operat;
00097         this->operatorx >> operat;
00098     if (operat == "&"){
00099                         operand >> op1;
00100                 operand >> op2;
00101                 ans = op1 & op2;
00102                 cout << op1 <<" & " << op2 << "=" << ans << endl;
00103     }
00104          else if(operat == "|"){
00105                         operand >> op1;
00106                 operand >> op2;
00107                 ans = op1 | op2;
00108                 cout << op1 <<" | " << op2 << "=" << ans << endl;
00109          }
00110          else if(operat=="~"){
00111                         operand >> op1;
00112                 if (op1 == 1){
00113                                 ans = false;
00114                 }
00115                 else{
00116                                 ans = true;
00117                 }
00118                 cout << "~"<<op1 << "=" << ans << endl;
00119     }
00120     return ans;
00121 }
